name: @aws-blocks/sagemaker-model-tuner-with-endpoint-deployment
description: ðŸ§  A Sagemaker Model Hyperparameter Tuning and Endpoint Deployment Serverless Application as a Cloudformation stack.

notes.text: Initial version release of the `sagemaker-model-tuner-with-endpoint-deployment` package.

author: Anil Sener <senera@amazon.com>

scripts.deploy: npm install && cd node_modules/@aws-blocks/ml-parameter-provider && sam build --template-file cloudformation.yml && aws s3 rm --recursive s3://${npm_config_s3bucket}/ml-parameter-provider-package && sam package --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket ${npm_config_s3bucket} --s3-prefix ml-parameter-provider-package && cd ../../../ && sam build --template-file cloudformation.yml && aws s3 rm --recursive s3://${npm_config_s3bucket}/ml-worklow-package && sam package  --output-template-file packaged.yaml  --s3-bucket ${npm_config_s3bucket} --s3-prefix ml-worklow-package && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region ${npm_config_region} --stack-name sagemaker-model-tuner-with-endpoint-deployment --s3-bucket ${npm_config_s3bucket}  --s3-prefix ml-worklow-package --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --parameter-overrides Environment=${npm_config_environment} ParameterStorePath=${npm_config_paramstorepath} ManifestS3BucketName=${npm_config_s3bucket} ManifestS3BucketKeyPrefix=manifests/  HyperparametersS3BucketName=${npm_config_s3bucket} HyperparametersS3Key=hyperparameters.json ParametersS3BucketName=${npm_config_s3bucket} ParametersS3Key=ml-parameters.json
scripts.deploy-win: npm install && cd node_modules/@aws-blocks/ml-parameter-provider && aws s3 rm --recursive s3://%npm_config_s3bucket%/ml-parameter-provider-package && sam package --template-file ../../../../ml-parameter-provider/.aws-sam/build/template.yaml --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket %npm_config_s3bucket% --s3-prefix ml-parameter-provider-package && cd ../../../ && sam build --template-file cloudformation.yml && aws s3 rm --recursive s3://%npm_config_s3bucket%/ml-worklow-package && sam package  --output-template-file packaged.yaml  --s3-bucket %npm_config_s3bucket% --s3-prefix ml-worklow-package && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region %npm_config_region% --stack-name sagemaker-model-tuner-with-endpoint-deployment --s3-bucket %npm_config_s3bucket%  --s3-prefix ml-worklow-package --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --parameter-overrides Environment=%npm_config_environment% ParameterStorePath=%npm_config_paramstorepath% ManifestS3BucketName=%npm_config_s3bucket% ManifestS3BucketKeyPrefix=manifests/  HyperparametersS3BucketName=%npm_config_s3bucket% HyperparametersS3Key=hyperparameters.json ParametersS3BucketName=%npm_config_s3bucket% ParametersS3Key=ml-parameters.json
